Despite his uncertain return date, Pant's lighthearted approach to recovery is evident.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/i-hate-this-so-much-frustrated-rishabh-pant-shares-injury-struggle-on-social-media/articleshow/123284880.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/i-hate-this-so-much-frustrated-rishabh-pant-shares-injury-struggle-on-social-media/articleshow/123284880.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 22:00:58 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="135316" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123284919,imgsize-135316.cms"/></item><item><title>Perplexity, itself valued at $18 billion, offers $34.5 billion for Google Chrome</title><description><![CDATA[Perplexity, an AI search startup, has made a bold $34.5 billion all-cash offer to acquire Google's Chrome browser, aiming to challenge Google's search dominance. This move comes as Google faces antitrust pressure to divest Chrome.       <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/stocks/rvnl-share-price-secures-rs-91-crore-southern-railway-order-for-video-surveillance-at-484-stations-19653630.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[The contract, valued at ₹90,65 crore, will be executed over a period of 18 months. The work falls under the normal course of RVNL’s business operations and will be carried out under general contract conditions. Shares of Rail Vikas Nigam Ltd ended at ₹326.25, down by ₹2.80, or 0.85%, on the BSE.]]></description>

      <title><![CDATA[CEF Group secures €38 million to launch Jammu and Ahmedabad biogas plants]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/startup/cef-group-funding-jammu-ahmedabad-biogas-plant-launch-19653625.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[CEF Group is powering India’s green energy future with a €38 million funding boost to launch two flagship compressed biogas plants in Jammu and Ahmedabad. These plants will process a combined 850 tonnes of municipal waste daily, producing 27 tonnes of clean bio-CNG fuel, along with organic manure and refuse-derived fuel for commercial use.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Wed, 13 Aug 2025 22:09:10 +0530]]></pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Swapnil Deshpande</dc:creator>
      <guid><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/startup/cef-group-funding-jammu-ahmedabad-biogas-plant-launch-19653625.htm]]></guid>
      <category><![CDATA[Business]]></category>
      <media:content height="675" width="1200" medium="image" url="https://images.cnbctv18.com/uploads/2023/12/startup-funding.jpg"/>

      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/economy/india-ibc-reforms-functional-framework-courts-experts-19653521.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Experts say proposed changes to the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code will only work if backed by a functional framework, not left to court-driven resolutions.       <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/stocks/tata-group-loses-120-billion-in-market-value-amid-tariffs-it-slowdown-19649176.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[The group’s crown jewel, Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), has been the biggest casualty, losing nearly $70 billion in market value since September last year. Tata Motors is the second-largest contributor to the group’s market cap erosion, with a decline of around $21 billion. Together, these two companies account for nearly 75% of the total erosion in market value over the past year.]]></description>

      <title><![CDATA[Google faces adtech abuse probe in India following startup association complaint]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/google-faces-adtech-abuse-probe-in-india-following-startup-association-complaint-19648408.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[In its complaint, ADIF alleged that Google, through its multiple group entities, has engaged in anti-competitive conduct by self-preferencing its own services in the AdTech ecosystem, including tying and bundling of its publisher ad server (DFP) with its ad exchange (AdX), and linking access to YouTube ad inventory with the use of its demand-side platform (DV360).]]></description>
